content.raw:
I did it that way because I was envisioning to create at least two ROS packages:

  * subt_gazebo: The simulation infrastructure.
  * subt_team: An example of a reference team implementation. This ROS package will depend on `subt_gazebo`.

Maybe we need to create other packages in the future. Does it make sense?
content.html:
